scripts.android:build: bash -c "mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets" && npm run android:bundle && npm run android:assemble
scripts.android:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run test:capture
scripts.test:capture: npm run android:build && npm run android:install && npm run android:log:clear && npm run android:launch && sleep 5 && npm run android:log && npm run android:stop
